subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The No. 3-seeded Tomic was upset by his fellow Australian John-Patrick Smith, 6-3, 7-5, in the opening round of the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships on Monday.
snippet: The No. 3-seeded Tomic was upset by his fellow Australian John-Patrick Smith, 6-3, 7-5, in the opening round of the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships on Monday.
